text: "Forbidden Voices" is a song by Dutch DJ and record producer Martin Garrix. It was released as a free download on 6 February 2015 and on 2 March 2015 on iTunes. The song has charted in France and the Netherlands. ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "Forbidden Voices" was first released onto YouTube on 6 February 2015 at a total length of three minutes and thirty seconds.Martin Garrix - Forbidden Voices - YouTube ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2015) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |} ==Release history== {|class=wikitable |- !
